io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.general.common

Class DbTestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.general.common.DbTestHelper

  • public class DbTestHelper
extends Object
    This class provides methods for handling the database during testing where resets (and other operations) may be necessary.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dropDatabase()
      Drops the whole database.
      void resetDatabase()
      Calls dropDatabase() internally, and migrates to the highest available migration (default) or to the migrationVersion specified by setMigrationVersion(String).
      void setMigrationVersion(String migrationVersion)
      This method sets the internal value of the migrationVersion.

    • Method Detail

      • dropDatabase

        public void dropDatabase()
        Drops the whole database.

      • resetDatabase

        public void resetDatabase()
        Calls dropDatabase() internally, and migrates to the highest available migration (default) or to the migrationVersion specified by setMigrationVersion(String).

      • setMigrationVersion

        public void setMigrationVersion(String migrationVersion)
        This method sets the internal value of the migrationVersion.
        Parameters:
        migrationVersion - new String value of migrationVersion. Must not be null
